```lisp
(:action fill
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?container - object ?location - place ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (located ?container ?location)
                    (present ?agent ?location)
                    (empty ?container)
                    (available ?resource ?location))
    :effect (and
              (filled ?container)
              (not (empty ?container))))

(:action get_resource
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?resource - object ?source - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (available ?npc)
                    (contains ?source ?resource)
                    (present ?npc ?source))
    :effect (and
              (has ?npc ?resource)
              (decreased ?source ?resource)))

(:action check
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?item - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and
                  (available ?npc)
                  (not (checked ?npc ?item))
                  (at ?npc ?location)
                 )
  :effect (checked ?npc ?item))

(:action turn
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?device - object)
  :precondition (and
                  (checked ?npc ?device)
                  (functional ?device)
                  (not (on ?device))
                )
  :effect (and
           (on ?device)
           (using ?npc ?device)))
```
